title: If you wish to watch
review: If you want to watch this movie it is a great idea. Be sure that when you watch it you are doing nothing else you must be paying attention the entire time. This movie is very deep you do not need to watch the first one in order to enjoy it. Though it does help. This movie will question everything that you believe about Humanity, and life. Be sure to watch with absolute intent to pay attention or you will not appreciate the work and genius that came in to developing and creating this masterpiece.
